name: Hunted Season 4
description:
Season Four is here and the new war begins!

With the activation of the gate over at Capital City, a passageway has been made over to a newly revamped Desert Village! Gold Wars Technology have started research at the area to help it rebuild itself after the horrific events that occurred there in Season Two! Find new research centres, enemy warehouses & more!

The Assault Troopers have fled from Desert Village after Gold Wars Technology joined the battle but the people who once lived at the Village have been changed by the weapons chaos. Fight against a zombie like horde which will try to stop you from uncovering the past! 

Hunted Season Four runs throughout August 28th - October 18th.

So grab your weapon, select your fighting field and dive into Hunted Season Four - New War!
